data.name: Heat Death
data.detailed_description:
This ancient galaxy is under attack by the mysterious "Apparitions". They are huge interstellar monstrosities which threaten to consume the world. Your planet is controlled using cards which you collect throughout the world. Build a deck of powerful weapons, shields, and other surprising and powerful effects. Ingenuity and resourcefulness will be the key to your victory!

Rewrite your cards!

Improve your deck even further by re-writing your cards! The game's unique crafting system is used to fuse cards into each other, allowing you to create unexpected synergies! For example, you can insert one card's text into a blank space on another, or you can carry a powerful bonus from one card onto another. In addition to cards, you can also upgrade your planet by finding unique tech which can provide additional synergy and firepower.

Heat Death is in early access, but already features 3 Planets and 200+ cards, with a variety of interesting effects and synergies.

  • The Human planet can swarm its opponents with drones, play defensively by buffing its allies, or stand on its own with versatile weapons and defenses.
  • The Radioactive planet focuses on fierce bursts of damage, and lays traps which detonate when opponents make their attack.
  • The Storm planet can recover from almost any attack with its powerful repairs, while growing stronger with every passing turn.



The game world consists of procedurally generated maps of stars and clusters. Death is permanent – you start from scratch each play session, to explore the countless interesting possibilities that exist in the game.

data.short_description: Build your deck, re-write your cards, and join in epic space battles! Heat Death is a single-player deckbuilder which takes card customization and power scaling to the extreme, as you battle against sentient stars and black holes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: x86 instruction set, 64-bit, 4 core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 or DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These recommendations are based on an estimate. Try out the free demo if you are uncertain.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.15+
  • Processor: i5 64-bit 4 core or M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 or DX12-capable GPUs, or M1
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These recommendations are based on an estimate. Try out the free demo if you are uncertain.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: The game will run natively on Apple silicon. If you are using a macbook without fans, you may need to turn off post-processing in the in-game settings, as the post-processing can produce a lot of heat.
